headline: Show HN: My Book Bulletproof TLS and PKI (Second Edition) Is Out
description:
Hello HN.

I am excited to share with you my new book, Bulletproof TLS and PKI. I've worked in this space since the very early days (think SSLv2), always frustrated with the fact that the field is vast but the documentation poor. That first led me to create SSL Labs (which ended up being very popular) and then the first edition of my book (in 2014), where I aimed to cover everything a curious person needed to know about SSL/TLS and PKI. Most importantly, it's a very practical book that you can use to just learn what you need at that moment. The second edition adds coverage of TLS 1.3. I publish two chapters as a separate (and free) OpenSSL Cookbook.

The best part of Bulletproof TLS and PKI is that it's a living book. There's nothing worse than obsolete documentation! Because none of the traditional publishers were interested in that sort of thing, we did everything ourselves. The manuscript is in DocBook, I write using OxygenXML, my copyeditor uses it as well, and there's a nightly build process that generates everything. We can even show exact differences across versions, for example you can see that here: https://blog.ivanristic.com/2022/02/bulletproof-tls-and-pki-...

I hope you'll enjoy the book.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 我的书《防弹的TLS和PKI（第二版）》出版了
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 我的書《防彈的TLS和PKI（第二版）》出版了
description_zh-Hans:
你好，HN。

我很高兴与你分享我的新书《防弹TLS和PKI》。我从很早的时候就开始在这个领域工作（想想SSLv2），一直对这个领域很广但文档很差的事实感到沮丧。这首先促使我创建了SSL实验室（最终非常受欢迎），然后是我的书的第一版（2014年），我的目标是涵盖一个好奇的人需要知道的关于SSL/TLS和PKI的一切。最重要的是，这是一本非常实用的书，你可以用它来学习你当时需要的东西。第二版增加了对TLS 1.3的报道。我将其中两章作为单独的（免费的）OpenSSL Cookbook出版。

Bulletproof TLS and PKI最好的部分是它是一本活的书。没有什么比过时的文档更糟糕的了！

https://blog.ivanristic.com/2022/02/bulletproof-tls-and-pki-...

I hope you'll enjoy the book.
